text: Gennaro Migliore (born 21 June 1968 in Naples) is an Italian politician. ==Biography== Gennaro Migliore was born on 21 June 1968 in Naples, Campania. Since his birth he lives in Casoria. He graduated in Physics in 2012 at the age of 44, with a final score of 110/110 cum laude. He is also registered with the journalists' register. He has been twice elected to the municipal council of Naples (1997 and 2001), in the ranks of the Communist Refoundation Party. In 2006 he was elected to the Chamber of Deputies, and served as the parliamentary group leader of the PRC. In 2008 he was a candidate for the Chamber on the Rainbow Left list, but was not elected due to the failure to cross the electoral threshold of 4%. In 2009 Migliore left the PRC, to follow Nichi Vendola in his new party, the Movement for the Left (later Left Ecology Freedom).
